enum SpatialGeometryValidity
 

GisSpatialGeometryValidity is an enumeration to denote the validity of a Geometry during a test of type and dimensionality..

Parameters:
GisSpatialGeometryValidity_None Indicates no specific validity; used for unknown or default states.
GisSpatialGeometryValidity_Valid Geometry passes a test.
GisSpatialGeometryValidity_Invalid Geometry fails a test.
GisSpatialGeometryValidity_InvalidButCanBeApproximated Geometry fails a test, but could be approximated using allowed types.
GisSpatialGeometryValidity_InvalidDueToDimensionality Geometry fails a test due to having an disallowed dimensionality.
.

Enumerator:
SpatialGeometryValidity_None 
SpatialGeometryValidity_Valid
